nodes.text: The Esooma system was a star system located in the Sprizen sector of the galaxy's Outer Rim Territories. It contained the planet Esooma, homeworld of the sentient Esoomian species.
The Esooma system was established in The Essential Atlas, a reference book written by Jason Fry and Daniel Wallace and released on August 18, 2009, which placed the system in grid square N-5.
